string.value: Gathering Ingredients for the Wolf's Life Water
One of the ingredients for the #t4032334# is the #t4032335#. Maybe #b#p2060005##k at the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells it? You'd better go see #p2060005#.
#p2060005# tells you that the #t4032335# that was given by the wolves living in #m230000003# is available, but only at a price. She says it'll cost you 80 million mesos.\r\n\r\n#b80,000,000 mesos#k
You purchased the #t4032335# from #p2060005#. You'll use it to make some #t4032334#.
Hi there! Aren't you the one that bought the Wolf Vitamins the other day? How can I help you this time? Do you need those vitamins again?\n#b#L0#(You ask if #t4032335# is available.)#l\n#k
#t4032335#? Yes I have a few leftover after giving them to #o5130104# and #o5140000# . Do you need that? Well, I can sell it to you, but…
Hello, customer. The item you've been looking for, #t4032335#, will cost you #b80 million mesos#k.
#b('Hello customer'? He's treating you nicely all of a sudden, as if you just walked into a shopping mall!)#k
I know it's a bit pricey, but…#t4032335# is such a rare item, that… Well, just give me 80 million mesos, and I will hand you the #t4032335# immediately.
Are you saying no to the offer? I was going to sell it to you for the low price of 80 million mesos…
I don't know what you're going to be using it for, but seeing that you truly love wolves, I am confident that you'll put it to good use.
Hahaha… Thanks to you, #m230000003# is no longer in the red. Hahaha…
Are you sure you brought #b80 million mesos#k, because you look short on cash... Please double-check your inventory.
